Since the=
 group is becoming fairly large, this is probably a good
opportunity to see=
 what the general opinion is about an important
question:  What do you thin=
k is the best application for NEAT?  That
is, if you had all the time in th=
e world, where would you use NEAT?
Perhaps to control some kind of vehicle,=
 in a video game (but what
kind of game?), board game, for predicition of s=
ome sort, in a big
artificial life world, maybe to evolve something other t=
han neural
nets, or something else?  

ken
